events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application form online to cover upcoming medical expenses.
The loan application was reviewed and categorised as a personal loan based on stated purpose relating to medical bills.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to guide the applicant through the personal loan process promptly.
The loan officer conducted an initial document review and assessed the completeness of the personal loan application.
Additional medical bills and proof of income were requested from the applicant to support the personal loan application.
The applicant promptly provided all requested medical bills and recent pay stubs as proof of income for verification.
A credit check was completed, indicating the applicant has a stable credit history suitable for a personal loan.
The risk assessment concluded that the personal loan would likely be repaid without issues given current income.
The loan officer presented an offer with competitive interest rates and flexible repayment terms to the applicant.
The applicant responded positively to the offer, expressing satisfaction with the loan conditions and repayment plan.
Following applicant acceptance, the personal loan was officially approved by the credit committee.
The funds were disbursed to the applicantâ€™s bank account, enabling them to cover their medical expenses immediately.
A follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant is satisfied with the loan repayment schedule and terms.
The personal loan application case was successfully closed after confirming all formalities and documentation were completed.
